doc.title: UK Uncovered
doc.plot: 24 episodes filmed in a variety of locations - over 100 in all - and the highlights edited into themed shows; OAP clubbers, fancy dress parties, foam parties, eccentrics, piercings, body art, games, sex, school disco, valentines, Halloween. A very quick-paced sojourn through the annals of what is a unique culture's national pastime. People who have never been to the UK and believe the Brits to be a reserved or uptight bunch will find themselves shocked to see the regular antics of a nation adept in the art of party. Also the first series to feature the start of "The Dilemma Question"; a variation on the familiar phrase 'Hoson's Choice' where, in this instance especially, either choice is particularly unpleasant.
